data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a huge statue, some ornate statues, a stand, some statues, some colorful pieces of cloth, and a cross here.

You are carrying a bible, and wearing a vestment and some muddy shoes.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the statues so that the sculptor repair them
data.mid_motivation: I want the sculptor to repair the statues so that our gods are happy
data.long_motivation: I want our gods to be happy so that they will bless our kingdom

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the sculptor, to ask if he can repair the statues

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put my hand in some of the people there, and bless them

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the bible, and begin to recite the scriptures

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go the sculptor and retrieve the statues
